description: Square array read by antidiagonals: T(i,j) = product prime[k]^(Ei[k] XOR Ej[k]) where Ei and Ej are the vectors of exponents in the prime factorizations of i and j; XOR is the bitwise operation on binary representation of the exponents.
comments: Analogous to multiplication, with XOR replacing +.
author: _Marc LeBrun_, Feb 06 2001
